Package com.netflix.genie.server.services

Interfaces and factories for core Genie services

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ClusterConfigService Abstraction layer to encapsulate data ClusterConfig functionality.
Classes implementing this abstraction layer must be thread-safe
ClusterLoadBalancer Interface for the cluster load-balancer, which returns the "best" cluster to run job on from an array of candidates.
ExecutionService Interface for the Execution Service.
Implementations must be thread-safe.
HiveConfigService Abstraction layer to encapsulate data HiveConfig functionality.
Classes implementing this abstraction layer must be thread-safe.
PigConfigService Abstraction layer to encapsulate PigConfig functionality.
Classes implementing this abstraction layer must be thread-safe.
 

Class Summary
BaseServiceFactory BaseServiceFactory class that others will inherit from.
ConfigServiceFactory Factory class to instantiate implementation of the various services.
ExecutionServiceFactory Factory class to instantiate the ExecutionService.
 

Package com.netflix.genie.server.services Description

Interfaces and factories for core Genie services
